p: Increased activity of ACE, therefore, results in the elevated levels of angiotensin II and overactivated AT1 receptors (Angiotensin II receptor type 1), which lead to lung injury ( Kuba et al., 2005). ACE2 receptors are widely distributed, and SARS-CoV-2 can affect a range of organs showing distinct clinical manifestations ( Zou et al., 2020).
